name: Lembas Bread
description: Elven waybread, highly nutritious and long-lasting.

name: Hobbiton Beef Stew
description: A hearty stew made with tender beef, potatoes, and carrots, slow-cooked to perfection.

name: Mushroom Pie
description: A savory pie filled with mushrooms, leeks, and creamy sauce, a Hobbit favorite.

name: Elven Salad
description: A fresh salad of mixed greens, edible flowers, and a light vinaigrette, inspired by the elves.

name: Roast Mutton
description: Succulent mutton roasted with herbs, served with a side of root vegetables.

name: Dwarven Ale
description: A strong, flavorful ale brewed by the dwarves of Erebor.

name: Gondorian Lamb
description: Roasted lamb seasoned with rosemary and garlic, a favorite in Gondor.

name: Bree Apple Tart
description: A sweet tart filled with spiced apples, a popular dessert in Bree.

name: Shire Sausages
description: Juicy sausages made from pork, seasoned with sage and other herbs, a Shire specialty.
